result.execSummary:
The defendant Tammy L Smith was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Concurrent with: Concurrent with probation in La Crosse Co case 15CF440, with conditions also concurrent
.

miscConds.notes:
Def to undergo Alcohol and Drug Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.
.

Def is not to consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances without a prescription from licensed physician, with random testing to ensure abstinence

No bars or taverns
.

Undergo any other assessments or evaluations deemed appropriate by the PO and follow-through with any treatment recommended

Pay Crime Lab and Drug Assessment fee (see 'other' above for amount)

Cash bond of $500 is to be applied to restitution and Court financial obligations owed - An Assessment Report will be done when restitution amount is known

Pay DOC Supervision fees

Credit for 45 days if probation is ever revoked

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of resititution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debtd

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tammy L Smith

records.addlTxt: restitution paid in full at DA office

State by Skemp /  Def in custody w/ Atty Meredith Davis
Motion & Order for consolidation w/ cases 13CM41, 13CM1746, 15CM48, 15CM311, 15CF440 & 15CF487
Stmt of Neg Plea / Plea Quest & Waiver filed
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed
State has complied w/ Victim Notification
Ct 3 - Def pleads GUILTY
CRT finds def understands proceedings & finds def's plea is F, V & I made - factual basis exists & CRT accepts plea & finds def guilty
Remaining Cts are Dismissed & read-in
CRT'S SENTENCE:  Sent w/held;  Probation 2 yrs Concurrent w/ 15CF440, w/ conditions also concurrent:  Complete 100 hrs Comm Serv. work - Concurrent w/ 15CF440 (1-time only);  AODA & follow-thru w/ trmt recommended;  No bars or taverns;  No alcohol or cont subs w/ o valid prescription, w/ random testing to ensure abstinence;  Pay restitution to Walmart - held open for 45 days;  Pay 10% rest surcharge to DA;  Undergo any other assessments or evaluations deemed approp by PO & follow-thru w/ trmt recommended;  Pay CC & DOC fees;  Credit for 45 days if probation is ever revoked
CRT reverses the Forfeiture of the $500 cash bond in 15CM41 & that is applied to restitution & CRT costs/fees

11:41 am   Def in court w/ Atty Meredith Davis.  Def in custody.  Edward Minser appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Prelim waiver filed - signed/understands.  No promises/threats.
COURT finds she F, V & I waives her right to a PH and accepted.  Probable cause found - Bound over for trial.
Information filed - Reading waived.  Def Pleads NG - NG Pleas entered.
PTC:  9/11 at 2:30 pm    STC:  10/1 at 10 am   TWB     Also: CC:  8/17 at 11:15 (plea on other files) EML
Davis argues for a sig bond.  Minser obj.  Fta's and multiple files.
COURT will leave the bond the way it is for the time being.

Def in custody w/Atty Davis
  Pretrial report filed
$10,000 cash bond req w/cond: no contact w/Walmart
